New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2023 年 10 月 11 日，星期三 06:14:00 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Man wins Family Court order to disown twins likely sired during threesome https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-wins-family-court-order-to-disown-twins-likely-sired-during- Threesome/YSCXUREG5ZE3HMQGCU7SHAMHHY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-wins-family-court-order-to-disown-twins-likely-sired-during- Threesome/YSCXUREG5ZE3HMQGCU7SHAMHHY/ Jeremy WilkinsonThe twins had his surname and he was named on their birth certificate. Wed, 11 Oct 2023 06:00:00 +0000 The twins were likely sired during a threesome.
501 appeal: Husband and wife deported from Australia after defrauding banks for $9m in loans https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/501-appeal-husband-and-wife-deported-from-australia-after-defrauding-banks-for-9m-in-loans/QOTXC6GVCNH4POR7RT7R6BPTVE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/501-appeal-husband-and-wife-deported-from-australia-after-defrauding-banks-for-9m-in-loans/QOTXC6GVCNH4POR7RT7R6BPTVE/ Tara ShaskeyThe couple used the funds to develop a significant property portfolio. Wed, 11 Oct 2023 06:00:00 +0000 A married couple has been deported from Australia after defrauding banks for loans totalling $9,027,833.51​.

Tenancy Tribunal orders landlords to fork out almost $10,000 after harassing tenants on shared property https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tenancy-tribunal-orders-landlords-to-fork-out-almost-10000-after-harassing-tenants-on-shared-property/FGL775ITBVHBPKT3P65IDMZNYY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tenancy-tribunal-orders-landlords-to-fork-out-almost-10000-after-harassing-tenants-on-shared-property/FGL775ITBVHBPKT3P65IDMZNYY/ Emily MoorhouseThe landlords removed the tenants' belongings from a shared shed and locked it. Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:00:00 +0000 The landlords were ordered to fork out almost $10,000 for breaching their obligations including harassing their tenants by playing loud music late into the night and locking them out of a shared shed.
